column1: #Text=We made up a game you can play with the air scooters !
#Text=" Air Nomad boy # 1 says : " Now that you 're the Avatar , it 's kind of an unfair advantage for whichever team you 're on .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I 'm still the same !
#Text=" Air Nomad boy # 1 says : " That 's the only fair way .
#Text=" Air Nomad boy # 2 says : " Sorry , Aang .
#Text=Now , who wants Jinju on their team ?
